content:
It is probably https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1891962.

According to the users with whom I have corresponded, the crash frequency can be reduced by removing or increasing the time interval of automatic checks for new mail in the pop account settings - 15-30 minutes for example.
creator: wsmwk

content: Does problem improve if you start Windows in safe mode with networking enabled - https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/help/12376/windows-10-start-your-pc-in-safe-mode ?
creator: wsmwk

content: Muhtemelen sunucunuzdan kaynaklanan bir sorun var. E-posta hizmeti aldığınız firmaya danışmalısınız.
creator: maxcoder

content:
In account settings, select the account and at the bottom of the list choose the delete action.

FWIW see https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/sending-and-receiving-messages-thunderbird#w_problems
creator: wsmwk

content: Could be. Also, what AV do you use?
creator: wsmwk

content: Probabilmente ha raggiunto dimensioni eccessive per poter essere compattata. Prova a dividere i messaggi che contiene in più sottocartelle e poi riprova a compattarle.
creator: @next
